snippet: Jeffrey Boyd, Gov. Rick Perry’s chief of staff, will becomes the newest Texas Supreme Court justice, one of seven current members chosen by Mr. Perry on the current court.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Boyd, Gov. Rick Perry’s chief of staff, will becomes the newest Texas Supreme Court justice, one of seven current members chosen by Mr. Perry on the current court.

headline.seo: Jeffrey Boyd Is 7th Perry Appointee on Texas High Court
headline.main: Make It One More Supreme Court Justice From the Perry Camp
headline.print_headline: Make It One More Supreme Court Justice From the Perry Camp
